snippet: Big Boi releases his second solo album, “Vicious Lies and Dangerous Rumors”; Wiz Khalifa has his second major-label album, “O.N.I.F.C.”; and Lifehouse is out with its sixth studio album, “Almería.”
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews second solo album by hip-hop artist Big Boi; Jon Caramanica reviews latest recording by rapper Wiz Khalifa; Nate Chinen reviews sixth studio release by alternative-rock band Lifehouse.

byline.original: By JON PARELES, JON CARAMANICA and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: Big Boi releases his second solo album, “Vicious Lies and Dangerous Rumors”; Wiz Khalifa has his second major-label album, “O.N.I.F.C.”; and Lifehouse is out with its sixth studio album, “Almería.”

headline.seo: Big Boi’s ‘Vicious Lies and Dangerous Rumors,’ and Lifehouse
headline.main: Swagger With a Bit of Angst
headline.print_headline: Swagger With a Bit Of Angst
